<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158428</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158428</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3026</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Online Exhibitions - - On One Clear Day</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Onlineausstellungen - - An Einem Vollen Tag</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expositions En ligne - - Un Temps Clair</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exhibitions Em linha - - Em Um Dia Desobstruído</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mostre In linea - - Un Giorno Libero</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε απευθείας σύνδεση εκθέσεις - - μια σαφή ημέρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Exposiciones En línea - - En Un Día Claro</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This exhibit "On One Clear Day" offers a glimpse into the world that was the town of Wolbrom in Poland before the war, its fate of its flourishing Jewish Community, and subsequent efforts to remember and to commemorate the community and those who perished.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">holocaust education</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">extermination</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Jewish commuity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">commemoration</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Ausstellung "an einem vollen Tag" bietet 
einen Blick in die Welt, die die Stadt von Wolbrom in Polen vor dem 
Krieg, seinem Schicksal seiner blühenden jüdischen Gemeinschaft und 
folgenden Bemühungen, an die Gemeinschaft sich zu erinnern und zu 
gedenken war und in die an, die umkamen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cet objet exposé "un temps clair" offre un 
aperçu au monde qui était la ville de Wolbrom en Pologne avant la 
guerre, son destin de son Communauté juive d'épanouissement, et 
efforts ultérieurs de se rappeler et commémorer la communauté et à
ceux qui ont périe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta exibição "em um dia desobstruído" oferece 
um glimpse no mundo que era a cidade de Wolbrom em Poland antes da 
guerra, de seu fate de sua comunidade jewish florescendo, e dos 
esforços subseqüentes recordar e comemorar a comunidade e naqueles 
que perished.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa esposizione "un giorno libero" offre un 
glimpse nel mondo che era la città di Wolbrom in Polonia prima della 
guerra, del relativo destino della relativa Comunità ebrea fiorente e
degli sforzi successivi ricordarsi e commemorare della Comunità ed in
coloro che è perito.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το έκθεμα "μια σαφή ημέρα" προσφέρει μια 
αναλαμπή στον κόσμο που ήταν η πόλη Wolbrom στην Πολωνία πριν 
από τον πόλεμο, τη μοίρα ακμάζοντας εβραϊκής Κοινότητάς του 
του, και τις επόμενες προσπάθειες να αναφερθεί και να τιμηθεί την 
μνήμη η κοινότητα και εκείνοι που χάθηκαν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este objeto expuesto "en un día claro" ofrece una
ojeada en el mundo que era la ciudad de Wolbrom en Polonia antes de la
guerra, de su sino de su comunidad judía que prosperaba, y de 
esfuerzos subsecuentes de recordar y de conmemorar a la comunidad y 
los que fallecieron.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">holocaust Ausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausrottung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Jüdisches commuity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gedenken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">holocauste éducation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">extermination</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Commuity juif</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">commémoration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">instrução do holocaust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">exterminação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Commuity jewish</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">commemoration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">formazione del holocaust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sterminio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Commuity ebreo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">commemoration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκπαίδευση ολοκαυτώματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξολόθρευση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εβραϊκό commuity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εορτασμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">educación del holocaust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">conmemoración</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
